settings.blogTextOne:
Weekend Adventure

JOSEF SEIBEL Noah 02. The Noah trainer-style leather shoe is perfect for everyday wear. With a lightweight and flexible EVA white sole unit the Noah 02 has the springy feeling of a new sports shoe but with the high-quality features of a well manufactured leather shoe from Josef Seibel. Featuring a perforated design and a padded contrasting ankle for added comfort and support.

Perfect for anything you have planned this weekend. Style with some comfy shorts and a grey tee and you're good to go!

Beach day

JOSEF SEIBEL Maverick 05. Men's lightweight, toe post, slip- on sandal sat on a lightweight, flexible and highly durable PU sole. The Maverick 05 men's sandal has a perforated hole designÂ and stitch features throughout, with a cushioned leather footbed for all day comfort.

Great to easily slip on at the beach! Pair with a button down and shorts for an effortless summers day look. Accessorize with a lightweight hat and your favourite sunglasses. Remember to pack the suncream!

Hiking in the sun

JOSEF SEIBEL Philipp 53 . Made with a water resistant upper and sturdy soles with a deep tread for extra grip and stability. Breathable mesh lining helps keep feet fresh and a cushioned footbed offers support and comfort when out hiking or as an everyday walking shoe.

Style with your favourite walking shorts and a breathable long sleve top to keep the sun off your back. Add a cap and your sports watch and you're ready to hit the trails!

Summers evening

JOSEF SEIBEL Maverick 03. Men's slip on leather mule with a handstitched sole and contrasting stitching throughout. The Maverick 03 has a cushioned leather footbed and leather inner linings ensuring all day comfortable wear underfoot. The flexible and hardwearing PU sole provides support and the unique contrasting stitch detail gives these every-day slip on shoes extra style.

Throw on with a white linen shirt and some smart shorts for the perfect evening look. Grab your camera and you're ready to capture the sunset.

Running errands

JOSEF SEIBEL vincent 08. A men's casual summer sandal with three adjustable straps for a tailored fit. Crafted using soft leathers with leather and textile linings. Sitting atop a hardwearing and flexible PU sole unit for all-day comfort and support.

Style with any everyday outfit for an effortless look. Add some sunglasses and a denim jacket for some added interest.
